attributes.action: introduce a power to weight restriction on the cars that newly qualified drivers can drive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that new drivers are involved in a large proportion of accidents while their skills are still developing, I feel it would be wise to introduce a limitation in the power output of the vehicles they are allowed to drive for a 2 year period having passed their driving test. This would also bring them into line with new motorcyclists where the policy has had a beneficial effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
